abstract: Proposal by congressional Republicans to arm Sunnis and Kurds in Iraq reignites long-standing suspicions held by Iraq's Shiite-led government that Americans are plotting to break up their country.
lead_paragraph: After congressional Republicans floated a plan to arm Iraqi Sunnis and Kurds directly, the country was outraged and saw a plot to divide their country.

headline.main: Proposal to Arm Sunnis Adds to Iraqi Suspicions of the U.S.
headline.print_headline: A Proposal to Arm Sunnis Fuels Talk of an American Plot to Divide Iraq

snippet: After congressional Republicans floated a plan to arm Iraqi Sunnis and Kurds directly, the country was outraged and saw a plot to divide their country.
